articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Performance Given by KPA Art Squad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Performance Given by KPA Art Squad
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoyed an art performance given by the art squad of KPA Unit 963 together with servicepersons of the KPA.
					 The squad put on the stage such colorful numbers of diverse genres as female quintet "We Serve the General", male solo and mixed octet "We Will Remain True to the Leadership of the Party", dialogic poem "Gigantic Footprints for Devoted Service", Oungum and female sextet "Bright Moon over Our Country", agitation through reminiscences "Comrades! Take This Revolver, Please!", serial of wartime songs "My Song in the Trench", "To a Decisive Battle" and "For My Only Motherland" and chorus "The Road of Victory".
					
					 The performers truthfully represented the invincible might of the strong revolutionary armed forces of Mt. Paektu which grew up to be a matchless army under the care of Kim Jong Il and the firm faith and will of the servicepersons of the KPA to devotedly defend the headquarters of the revolution and surely accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche with arms under his leadership. 
					
					 They also fully demonstrated the might of the soldier-artistes creditably performing their sacred mission as buglers in the Songun era.
					
					 Kim Jong Il congratulated the performers on their successful presentation and expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the members of the art squad of the unit staged a splendid performance rich in ideological contents and high in artistry with art works of great cognitive and educational value which truthfully and vividly reflected the servicepersons' inexhaustible mental power and noble moral traits and their worthwhile service.
					
					 Saying that the performers successfully represented the true picture of the revolutionary army of the DPRK dynamically advancing full of optimism and joy with transparent outlook on the leader and the revolution, he repeatedly appreciated their revolutionary style of creating art works.
					
					 The performance given by the art squad of the above-said unit, in particular, is the best of the performances presented by art squads recently, he noted, extending special thanks of the supreme commander to all the creators and artistes for having registered distinguished success. 
					
					 Noting that the servicepersons of the KPA have grown to be indomitable fighters who cherish the spirit of devotedly defending the leader and the spirit of becoming human bombs as their unshakable faith, he stressed that socialism centered on the popular masses in the DPRK is invincible and the revolutionary cause of Juche is sure to emerge victorious as the defense line of the country is reliably defended by that matchless great army. 
					
					 He advanced important tasks that would serve as guidelines for intensifying the revolutionary and militant art performing activities.
					
					 Among the audience were KPA General Yun Jong Rin, KPA Col. General Kim Song Dok and other commanding officers of the army, Department Director Kim Kyong Hui, First Vice Department Directors Kim Kyong Ok, Ri Je Gang and Ri Jae Il and other leading officials of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Greets Cuban President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Greets Cuban President
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il together with Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a congratulatory message to Raul Castro Ruz, second secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, president of the Council of State and president of the Council of Ministers of Cuba, on his birthday.
					 The message said:
					
					 We extend warm congratulations and comradely greetings to you on your birthday.
					
					 Availing ourselves of this opportunity, we express belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the peoples of the two countries based on the revolutionary principle would continue to strengthen and wish you greater success in your work as well as good health and happiness.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Ri Jong Bu
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Ri Jong Bu
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il, on Tuesday sent a wreath to the bier of Ri Jong Bu, who was a general officer of the KPA, expressing deep condolences over his death.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Lao President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Lao President
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a message of congratulations to Choummaly Saynasone, president of Laos, on his birthday.
					 Expressing pleasure over the fact that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries are further developing in the common struggle for socialism, Kim in the message sincerely wished the president happiness in good health and greater successes in his work for making his country prosperous.

articles.title: Kim Yong Il Congratulates Trinidad and Tobago's PM
articles.content:
Kim Yong Il Congratulates Trinidad and Tobago's PM
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Il, premier of the DPRK, Tuesday sent a congratulatory message to Kamla Persad-Bissessar upon her election as prime minister of Trinidad and Tobago.
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the future in the idea of independence, peace and friendship, Kim in the message wished the prime minister successes in her work for the national unity and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Rallies Held to Condemn Anti-DPRK Smear Campaign
articles.content:
Rallies Held to Condemn Anti-DPRK Smear Campaign
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- Mass rallies took place in North Phyongan, Jagang, South Hamgyong and Ryanggang provinces on June 1 and 2 to denounce the U.S. imperialists and the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for their smear campaign against the DPRK. 
					 The rallies were attended by officials of local party and power bodies, social organizations, organs at different levels, industrial establishments and farms, working people and youth and students.
					
					 Reporters and speakers there said that due to the unprecedented campaign of the south Korean warmongers and the U.S. imperialist aggressors to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK, the situation on the Korean Peninsula has become extremely tense, adding that the hideous farce orchestrated by the enemies is little short of an open declaration of a war against the DPRK. 
					
					 They expressed full support for the statement issued by a spokesman for the DPRK National Defence Commission, the statement issued by a spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea, a crucial notice released by the General Staff of the Korean People's Army and a statement issued by a spokesman for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs in which they solemnly declared the DPRK's principled stand to protect the security of the country and nation in view of the prevailing grave situation. 
					
					 They stressed that all the people of the DPRK are now fully ready to react to the enemies' "punishment" with merciless retaliatory blows and mete out a stern punishment to the heinous war maniacs.
					
					 They expressed their firm resolutions to devotedly defend General Secretary Kim Jong Il, the destiny and future of the country, and protect dignified Korean-style socialism, united close around the headquarters of the revolution. 
					
					 The Korean people will bring about fresh miracles and innovations in every work-site for building a thriving nation in the transparent spirit of defending the country and thus once again demonstrate their indomitable stamina displayed in the crucible of the Songun revolution, they declared.

articles.title: Vietnamese Embassies Help Korean Farmers
articles.content:
Vietnamese Embassies Help Korean Farmers
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- Councilor Nguyen Dinh Duong and other officials of the Vietnamese embassy here did a friendly work on the DPRK-Vietnam Friendship Migok Cooperative Farm in Sariwon City, North Hwanghae Province, on Wednesday. 
					 They helped the farmers, deepening friendship.
					
					 They handed aid materials to the farm.

articles.title: Children's Day Observed
articles.content:
Children's Day Observed
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- Children in the DPRK joyously marked the 60th International Children's Day on Tuesday.
					 Sports and amusement games and art performances took place at such nurseries and kindergartens as Kim Jong Suk Nursery, Kang Pan Sok Nursery, Changgwang Kindergarten and Pyongyang Rungna Kindergarten No. 2 and parks and recreation grounds in the capital city.
					
					 International Children's Day was also happily marked at nurseries and kindergartens of the February 8 Vinalon Complex, chemical products production centers in Hungnam and Namhung, machine-building bases in Rakwon and Ryongsong, the Migok Co-op Farm in Sariwon City, the Unhung Co-op Farm of Thaechon County, the Tongbong Co-op Farm of Hamju County, etc.
					
					 Similar events took place at kindergartens of the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex and in Chongjin and Kaesong cities. 
					
					 Kindergarteners in South Hamgyong Province and Phyongsong City staged colorful numbers at the Hamhung Grand Theatre and the Cultural House of South Phyongan Province. 
					
					 International Children's Day was significantly observed by children in all parts of the country ranging from Mubong village at the foot of Mt. Paektu to villages in the areas along the Military Demarcation Line and islands and islets in the east and west seas.

articles.title: Premier League Ends
articles.content:
Premier League Ends
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- The third round of the premier league soccer matches took place at Kim Il Sung Square in Pyongyang from May 10 to 31 as part of the Sports Contest for Pochonbo Torch Prize.
					 Participating in the matches were eight male and six female teams.
					
					 The Sobaeksu men's team (seven matches, five wins, one draw and one loss) and the April 25 women's team (five matches, four wins and one draw) took the first place.
					
					 The Pyongyang and Amnokgang teams finished second in the male and female matches respectively, while the Kigwancha and Rimyongsu teams third.
					
					 In the second round held as part of the Mangyongdae Prize Sports Contest, the Sobaeksu men's team took the fourth place and the April 25 women's team won the top place.

articles.title: People Give Helping Hand to Farming
articles.content:
People Give Helping Hand to Farming
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- Many people of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea are out in helping the rural communities in rice transplantation, in response to the call of the Workers' Party of Korea for channeling all effort into farming.
					 Ministries, national institutions, agencies, enterprises and residential units have rendered manpower to the cooperative farms, while giving material and technical assistance to the rural economy.
					
					 The Machine-Building Industry, Forestry, Posts and Telecommunications, Light Industry and other ministries have sent farming materials, farm machine parts, several hundred pieces of small farm implements and consumer goods to the rural communities.
					
					 Electricity has been supplied preferentially to the countryside.
					
					 The Hungnam Fertilizer Complex and other relevant establishments throughout the country are mass-producing various kinds of efficacious fertilizers suitable to biological features of crops.
					
					 Artistes from Pyongyang and local areas are finding themselves on farms to encourage peasants and helpers in their rice transplantation.
					
					 Medical workers are also offering field service to them.
					
					 The rice transplanting is progressing apace thanks to nationwide assistance.

articles.title: Successes Made by Light Industrial Factories
articles.content:
Successes Made by Light Industrial Factories
Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- A great many modern light industrial factories have been built or existing ones have been renovated and their production processes actively put on a CNC basis in the DPRK over the past two decades since the publication of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "On Thoroughly Carrying Out a Revolution in Light Industry."
					 The Sinuiju Cosmetics Factory, the Taedonggang Beer Factory and the Taehongdan Potato Processing Factory were built and went operational in the new century in the wake of the construction on an expansion basis of the Hwangju Textile Mill, the Sakju Foodstuff Factory and the Kangso Ceramic Factory in the 1990s. 
					
					 The Pujon Potato Starch Factory, the Huichon Ceramic Factory, the Rakrangdaesong Garment Factory, the Rajin Garment Factory, the Samjiyon Soy and Bean Paste Factory, the Taedonggang Foodstuff Factory, the Kangso Mineral Water Processing Factory and others have been newly built or constructed on an expansion basis. 
					
					 There have sprung up in different provinces general foodstuff factories with the Samilpho Special Products Factory as a model. 
					
					 New shops have gone operational or existing ones have been renovated at silk and knitwear factories to boost the production of quality silk, knitwear, blanket and products of various other varieties. 
					
					 The Wonsan Shoes Factory has finished the updating of equipment for the shoes production and stepped up the process of putting the sewing equipment on a CNC basis. Production processes of sole mold and plastic sole and others have been successfully updated at such factories as Ryuwon, Pothonggang, Sinuiju and Sariwon footwear factories and Pyongyang and Sunchon shoes factories. 
					
					 The material and technical foundations of essential foodstuff producers in different parts of the country have been consolidated and the reconstruction projects are progressing at a final phase at the Pyongyang Cornstarch Factory and the Pyongyang Flour-Processing Factory. 
					
					 There have appeared high-level processes for the production of "cosmos" hairpins and "spring fragrance" cosmetics to reenergize their production.
					
					 Such machine-building plants as the Pyongyang Textile Machine Plant and the Pyongyang Shoes Machine Plant have succeeded in making technological updating of the production processes to ensure the production of effective elastic staff looms and shoemaking streamline and others.
					
					 Scientists and technicians in the field of light industry are successfully putting equipment and production processes on a CNC basis while satisfactorily solving the existing scientific and technological problems.

articles.title: Quadruplets Join Army
articles.content:
Quadruplets Join Army
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- Quadruplets in Unjong-ri, Sukchon County, South Phyongan Province, joined the Korean People's Army in April.   
					 The boys were born in the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital in Juche 82 (1993).
					
					 President Kim Il Sung sent such gifts as four silver-decorated knives, cloth, underwear, blankets, beddings, a gold ring and honey to the babies and their mother Kim Hyon Hui.
					
					 When they were in the hospital, eighteen doctors were in charge of them. 
					
					 A two-storied and twelve-room house was built for them at the state expense.
					
					The house is full of gifts sent by General Secretary Kim Jong Il to them.
					
					 Kim Hyon Hui had a doctor in charge of her sons.   
					
					 Even in the period of the "Arduous March" when the country was going through harsh ordeals, they were fully provided with rice, foodstuffs, protective goods, clothes, footwear and school things.
					
					 When they were graduating from the secondary school, they had different dreams of their future.
					
					 But all of them made up their mind to join the army to defend the country that they have owed so many things to. Their names are Paek Jo Song, Paek Guk Song, Paek Po Song, Paek Wi Song, their middle names meaning national defence.

articles.title: Japan Accused of Accomplices in Case of Warship Sinking
articles.content:
Japan Accused of Accomplices in Case of Warship Sinking
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- The prime minister of Japan, when referring to the sinking of a warship of the south Korean puppet navy some days ago, blustered that "Japan should take the lead in sponsoring a resolution of the UN Security Council if requested" by south Korea. 
					 In this regard Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in a signed commentary:
					
					 The case is a despicable charade orchestrated by the south Korean puppet forces with the U.S. approval and under its patronage. 
					
					 There is no justification whatsoever for Japan to impertinently behave, patronizing the accomplices in the case.
					
					 The inveterate bad habit of Japan of dancing to the tune of others without any principle has resurfaced. 
					
					 Taking the advantage of the case, the Japanese reactionaries are becoming ridiculous in their bid to create an international environment favorable for staging a comeback to Korea in "contingency" on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 No sooner had "the results of the investigation" into the case been announced than Japan voiced "support" and "cooperation" to please its U.S. master, as if it had been waiting for them. This behavior was prompted by a sinister intention.
					
					 Japan, blinded by its wild ambition to stage a comeback to Korea, is going reckless, sticking to its biased stand unaware of who is really to blame for the case and the nature of the case. 
					
					 Japan is so cunning as to draw water to its mill while supporting the U.S. and the south Korean puppet authorities that cooked up so hideous case through a collusion. This is nothing but a ridiculous behavior of a political pigmy without an equal in the world. 
					
					 Japan had better behave with reason if it does not wish to suffer bitter shame in the eyes of the world while going reckless over the said case.

articles.title: Actions for Judging Lee Myung Bak Regime Called for
articles.content:
Actions for Judging Lee Myung Bak Regime Called for
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- The Preparatory Committee for the Student Committee of the Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration in south Korea issued an appeal titled "Let us judge with ballots of peace the Lee Myung Bak regime creating a war crisis " on May 31.
					 The appeal said that the Lee regime is creating a grave situation which may bring the disasters of another June 25 war, adding that the inter-Korean relations are uncontrollably inching close to a cliff, increasing the danger of military clash. 
					
					 If south Koreans, taken in by the Lee regime's propaganda about the "north wind," allow the "Grand National Party" to lay a foundation for staying in power in the "elections to local self-governing bodies," the peace on the Korean Peninsula can never be guaranteed, the appeal warned, and continued:
					
					 This year marking the lapse of 60 years since the outbreak of the Korean war urgently requires all the compatriots to eradicate the wounds left by the war and head for lasting peace and reunification of the peninsula.
					
					 Whoever is a member of the Korean nation is duty-bound to work for peace and reunification so as to prevent the south and the north from leveling their guns at each other and pursuing confrontation and antagonism. 
					
					 Let's judge the Lee Myung Bak and GNP's propaganda about the “north wind" with ballots of peace.
					
					 Let's isolate the Lee regime by dint of candlelight rallies.
					
					 The Lee regime has deceived the people and made a mockery of them and disturbed peace. Let's judge it with ballots of peace in the same spirit as displayed by tens of thousands of people when staging candlelight rallies at the Kwanghwamun plaza in 2008.

articles.title: Slogan for Actions to Judge Lee Myung Bak Published in S. Korea
articles.content:
Slogan for Actions to Judge Lee Myung Bak Published in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration in south Korea on May 29 made public a slogan for actions to judge the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors hell-bent on the reckless moves to ignite a war.
					 The slogan noted that the fiction about the "north wind" concocted by the Lee Myung Bak regime is not mere one for attaining an "election purpose" but a gambling made under the pretext of "security" to plunge the whole Korean Peninsula into a war. It called for averting the war by concerted efforts of all Koreans.
					
					 It denounced the Lee regime for falsifying the truth behind the case of warship "Cheonan" and urged it to open the truth to the public.
					
					 Branding the Lee regime as an undemocratic dictatorial regime, a regime incapable of saving people's living from destitution and a pro-Japanese and pro-U.S. traitorous regime, the slogan called for getting the single candidate of the progressive camp "elected" to judge Lee Myung Bak.
					
					 It called upon all the people to struggle shoulder to shoulder till this land is cleared of the dark clouds of a war and peace settles there, democracy is won and a good society for the common people is built there.

articles.title: Russian Expert Doubts about "Results of Investigation"
articles.content:
Russian Expert Doubts about "Results of Investigation"
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- Konstantin Asmolov, senior researcher at the Center for Korean Studies of the Far Eastern  Institute of the Russian Academy of Sciences, expressed strong doubts about the south Korean authorities' assertion concerning the case of the warship sinking, when interviewed by a reporter of Moskovskii Komsomolets, according to NTV of Russia on May 31.
					 He said:  
					
					The "conclusion" made by the south Korean side is arousing very strong distrust among people in south Korea and other parts of the world. 
					
					 Both Russia and China do not believe this "conclusion" at all.
					
					 There are a lot of doubts about the "conclusion" as "evidence" and facts do not match the circumstances fabricated by the south Korean side.
					
					 For example, why did the case claim the lives of seamen only, without taking the life of a single officer?
					
					Why wasn't there anyone who had his eardrum split or fractured among the victims? This is the general phenomenon which can be observed when a warship is hit by a torpedo.
					
					 What is marked on the propelling body of the torpedo was written with a felt-tip pen in the writing style common in the south, not in the "north Korean writing style." Why?

articles.title: US and Lee Myung Bak Anti-DPRK Campaign Censured
articles.content:
US and Lee Myung Bak Anti-DPRK Campaign Censured
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- The Executive Committee of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia issued a statement on May 27 slashing at the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet clique for their evermore undisguised anti-DPRK smear campaign.
					 The DPRK advanced peace proposals for the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula, but the hostile forces have steadily strained the situation in the region, putting peace at peril, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Expressing concern about the fact that the tension on the peninsula is leading to the brink of a war, the Executive Committee of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia demands that the case of the warship "Cheonan" sinking be probed in detail and fairly with world experts including an inspection group of the DPRK National Defence Commission involved.
					
					 We urge the U.S. administration to make a bold decision to bring about a switchover in its hostile policy towards the DPRK, not to render the situation unstable but accept peace proposals made by the DPRK and sit at the negotiating table with it.
					
					 We support the DPRK in its efforts to defend its sovereignty and the political system chosen by its people.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Central Committee of the Czechoslovak Communist Party and the Federal Leadership of the Left Bloc of the Austrian Trade Union Federation released statements on the same day denouncing the U.S. imperialists and the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors' anti-DPRK moves.
					
					 The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in a joint statement on May 26 extended full support to the statement made public by a spokesman of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea in which it decided to severe all relations with south Korea.
					
					 The Staffordshire, Britain, Branch of the Korean Friendship Association in its statement on May 25 urged the British government not to get involved in the reckless moves of the Lee Myung Bak group and called on the trade union organizations and those of the movement for peace against imperialism to turn out in the actions for checking the dangerous provocations of the south Korean authorities.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Anti-Reunification Acts under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Anti-Reunification Acts under Fire
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- The United Confederation of Koreans in Far East of Russia and the U.S. Western Regional Committee under the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration made public statements on May 28 blasting the fabrication of the case of warship "Cheonan" by the puppet group of traitors of south Korea.
					 The U.S. Western Regional Committee in its statement accused the Lee Myung Bak regime of groundlessly linking the said case with the DPRK in collusion with outside forces and blocking the event common to the nation marking the anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration, thereby pushing the inter-Korean relations to the worst phase. 
					
					 The statement recalled that since the day traitor Lee Myung Bak came to power, he has pursued the policy of confrontation with the DPRK even in the international arena, bringing to naught the precious successes achieved after the publication of the above-said declaration and, at the same time, driven the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of a war.
					
					 It urged the Lee regime to stop at once its anti-DPRK confrontation racket and smear campaign and war moves over the case of the warship sinking cooked up by it and take measures for inter-Korean reconciliation and cooperation. 
					
					 The United Confederation of Koreans in Far East of Russia in its statement demanded that the south Korean authorities immediately halt the reckless treacherous and anti-reunification acts going against all the fellow countrymen's desire and wishes for reunification.
					
					  It reiterated its will to vigorously struggle to achieve the peaceful reunification of the country and peace and stability of the peninsula together with the peace-loving people the world over.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il ve funcion artistica de la Unidad 963 del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il ve funcion artistica de la Unidad 963 del EPC
Pyongyang, 2 de junio (ATCC) -- El Dirigente  Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, presencio junto con los oficiales y soldados del EPC la funcion del grupo de propaganda artistica de la Unidad 963 del EPC.
					En la ocasion fueron interpretadas las piezas de diferentes formas y generos como el quinteto femenino "Servir para el General", el solo masculino y octeto mixto "Apoyaremos con fidelidad la direccion del partido", la poesia en dialogo "Las huellas de gran abnegacion", la ejecucion del instrumento coreano Oungum y sexteto femenino "Luna llena de mi patria", la agitacion segun la reminiscencia "Camaradas, reciban este fusil", la serie de las canciones creadas durante la pasada guerra coreana "Mi cancion en la trinchera", "A la batalla decisiva" y "Por la unica patria", el coro "El camino de victoria", etc.  
					
					 A traves de la funcion, los ejecutantes describieron bien el poderio del ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu crecido como el invencible en el regazo del gran General Insigne, la ferrea conviccion y voluntad de los militares del EPC de defender a costa de la vida a la Direccion de la Revolucion y cumplir sin falta con las armas la causa revolucionaria del Juche bajo la guia del Dirigente. 
					
					Ademas, mostraron el poderio de los artistas militares que cumplen satisfactoriamente con su sagrada mision de trompeteros de la era del Songun. 
					
					El Dirigente felicito el exito de la funcion poniendose muy satisfecho de que los miembros del grupo de propaganda artistica hayan ofrecido esta magnifica funcion de alto valor ideologico y artistico componiendola con las obras de gran importancia educativa y cognoscitiva que reflejan veraz y vividamente el inagotable poderio espiritual, los nobles rasgos morales y la digna vida de servicio de los militares.
					
					 Elogio reiteradamente el revolucionario estilo de creacion de los ejecutantes especificando que ellos mostraron bien los verdaderos aspectos de nuestro ejercito revolucionario que posee la inconmovible concepcion del lider y la revolucion y avanza a pasos firmes con gran optimismo y pasion. 
					
					En particular, la funcion del grupo de propaganda artistica de la unidad 963 es la mas magnifica de las ofrecidas ultimamente, recalco y dio el agradecimiento especial del Comandante Supremo a todos los creadores y artistas que alcanzaron este exito relevante.
					
					Los militares del ejercito popular han crecido como combatientes indoblegables que guardan como su conviccion invariable el espiritu de defender al lider estallandose como bombas y balas, senalo y agrego que gracias a este ejercito sin rival que defiende firmemente las trincheras de la patria, es invencible nuestro socialismo centrado en las masas populares y esta asegurada la victoria de la causa revolucionaria del Juche. 
					
					Al final, indico las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia para intensificar la propaganda artistica de caracter revolucionario y combativo. 
					
					  Le acompanaron en esta ocasion el general de ejercito del EPC Yun Jong Rin, el coronel general del EPC Kim Song Dok y otros comandantes del EPC, la jefa de departamento del CC del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui, los primeros subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Kim Kyong Ok, Ri Je Gang y Ri Jae Il y otros cuadros directivos del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il felicita a Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il felicita a Raul Castro Ruz
Pyongyang, 2 de junio (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia 2 junto con el presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, Kim Yong Nam, un mensaje de felicitacion a Raul Castro Ruz, Segundo Secretario del CC del Partido Comunista de Cuba y Presidente de los Consejos de Estado y de Ministros de la Republica de Cuba, con motivo de su cumpleanos.
					El mensaje sigue:
					
					Enviamos nuestras calidas felicitaciones y salutaciones camaraderiles a Usted quien acoge su cumpleanos.
					
					Aprovechando esta oportunidad, expresamos la conviccion de que seguiran fortaleciendose y desarrollandose las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los pueblos de nuestros dos paises basadas en los principios revolucionarios y deseamos de todo corazon a Usted buena salud, felicidad y mayores exitos en su trabajo.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il envia ofrenda floral al feretro de difunto Ri Jong Bu
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il envia ofrenda floral al feretro de difunto Ri Jong Bu
Pyongyang, 2 de junio (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, envio el dia primero la ofrenda floral ante el feretro del difunto Ri Jong Bu, ex general del EPC, en senal de profundas condolencias por su fallecimiento.

articles.title: Continuan mitines provinciales contra el complot anti-RPDC
articles.content:
Continuan mitines provinciales contra el complot anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 2 de junio (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar ayer y hoy en las provincias de Phyong-an del Norte, de Jagang, de Hamgyong del Sur y de Ryanggang los mitines condenatorios a la campana de confrontacion con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea que lanzan los imperialistas norteamericanos y la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak. 
					Participaron en los actos los funcionarios de los organismos del partido y el Poder, las entidades sociales, las instituciones, fabricas, empresas y granjas a todos los niveles, los trabajadores, jovenes y estudiantes en las respectivas localidades. 
					
					Los oradores senalaron que debido a la conspiracion anti-RPDC de los belicistas surcoreanos y los agresores norteamericanos, la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana llega al estado extremadamente agudo y subrayaron que el complot, trazado por los enemigos en torno al caso del "Cheonan" significa abierta declaracion de guerra contra la RPDC. 
					
					Expresaron el apoyo total a la declaracion del portavoz del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea que expuso solemnemente la posicion de principios de defender la seguridad del pais y la nacion frente a la grave situacion creada, la del portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria, el aviso importante del Estado Mayor General del Ejercito Popular de Corea y la del portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores al respecto. 
					
					Ahora, todo el pueblo coreano esta dispuesto a responder con el implacable golpe de venganza al "castigo merecido" de los enemigos y a castigar duro a los monstruosos maniacos de guerra, subrayaron. 
					
					Manifestaron la decision de defender a costa de la vida al Dirigente Kim Jong Il, destino y futuro de la patria, y el muy digno socialismo al estilo coreano uniendose firmemente en torno a la Direccion de la Revolucion.
					
					Con la firme disposicion de defender la patria, crearemos nuevos milagros e innovaciones en los lugares de construccion de la gran potencia prospera y volveremos a mostrar el indoblegable impetu del pueblo coreano crecido en el fragor de la revolucion del Songun, concluyeron.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia a Japon que se confabula con Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia a Japon que se confabula con Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 2 de junio (ATCC) -- Recientemente, el premier japones dijo que si el Sur de Corea "demanda la resolucion del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU" con respecto al incidente del buque de guerra "Cheonan" del ejercito titere, su pais debe moverse al frente para conseguirla.
					El hundimiento del "Cheonan" es el complot inventado por los titeres surcoreanos bajo la aprobacion y el amparo de Estados Unidos, ratifica Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido hoy y prosigue:
					
					Por eso, Japon no tiene ningun pretexto de defender a esos complices.
					
					Parece que se reproduce el vicio cronico de Japon de dejarse llevar por los otros.
					
					Aprovechando el incidente del "Cheonan", los reaccionarios japoneses actuan ridiculamente para crear el ambiente internacional favorable a la nueva agresion a Corea en el "tiempo de emergencia" de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					De ahi que tan pronto como fuera publicado el "resultado de investigacion" de los titeres surcoreanos, Japon expreso su "apoyo" y voluntad de "cooperar" adulando a su amo norteamericano.
					
					Alucinado por la ambicion de agredir de nuevo a Corea, Japon se porta con el favoritismo al Sur de Corea sin querer saber quien es el culpable verdadero del incidente ni que caracter tiene este asunto.
					
					Esta conducta de zorro la puede tener unicamente ese enano (Japon) del mundo en los asuntos politicos.
					
					Seria mejor a Japon recobrar el juicio si no quiere pasar la verguenza a la vista del mundo por actuar ridiculamente en el caso del "Cheonan" coproducido por el amo gringo y sus titeres surcoreanos.
